common_0210_rival_03:
You can come here to take care of a lot of things
related to your Pokémon.[VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0210_rival_04: But I’ll leave the explanations to the pros here.[VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0210_pokecen_01:
Happy to be of service—and welcome to the
Pokémon Center!
common_0210_pokecen_02: I’m here to keep everyone’s Pokémon healthy.
common_0210_pokecen_03:
And this to my right is the Technical Machine
Machine—TM Machine for short!
common_0210_pokecen_04:
It’s your ticket to making TMs, which you can use
to teach moves to your Pokémon.
common_0210_pokecen_05:
You’ll need to pay in [VAR COLOR(0006)]LP[VAR COLOR(0000)] and supply the machine
with [VAR COLOR(0006)]materials[VAR COLOR(0000)] that Pokémon drop.
common_0210_rival_10:
LP comes in handy both at these machines and at
stores! I’ve got a lot—here, have some![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0210_rival_11: Oh yeah, and some of these too![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0210_system_01:
You received lots of Pokémon [VAR COLOR(0008)]materials [VAR COLOR(0000)]from
Nemona!
common_0210_pokecen_06:
Here on my left is the Poké Mart counter! You
can buy things like Poké Balls and Potions.
common_0210_shop_01:
Hello! We accept payment both in cash and in
[VAR COLOR(0006)]LP[VAR COLOR(0000)]—[VAR COLOR(0006)]League Points[VAR COLOR(0000)], that is. One LP is worth 1!
common_0210_pokecen_07:
And at the Union Circle, you can connect
with other Trainers to find yourself some\r
adventuring companions!
common_0210_pokecen_08:
Come visit us at the Pokémon Center anytime
you need any help!
common_0210_rival_06:
Remember: “Had a rough adventure?
Get to the Pokémon Center!”\c
Sometimes you have to know this sort of stuff for
quizzes at school.[VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0210_rival_08:
But mnemonics help out! Here’s another one:
“[VAR COLOR(0006)]‘R’ you ready?[VAR COLOR(0000)] Then [VAR COLOR(0006)]Let’s Go[VAR COLOR(0000)]!”\c
Goofy, sure, but it helps you remember you can
[VAR COLOR(0006)]send your lead Pokémon out with the R Button[VAR COLOR(0000)]![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0210_rival_09:
That way, you can have the Pokémon that’s
walking with you go pick up items lying around\r
or go battle on its own or other stuff like that![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0210_rival_07:
Now, time to go. Once we leave Los Platos, we’ll
hit the best-known spot in the South Province’s\r
Area One: the massive hill on the way to school!\c
You’ll usually find Trainers there who are just
itching to battle. Good luck![VAR 0114(0004)]
